quests.name: Automotive Appeal
objectives: Talk to Goofy.

Dress up like a mechanic:
  ‧ 1 Rustic or Casual Top.
  ‧ 1 Rustic or Casual Pants.
  ‧ 1 Rustic or Casual Shoes.

Gather resources for an Automobile Mechanic's Toolbox:
  ‧ 20 Antique Clothes Irons.
  ‧ 5 Rusty Hinges.
  ‧ 3 Wire Coat Hangers.
  ‧ 2 Jasper.
Craft an Automobile Mechanic's Toolbox.
Make sure the Automobile Mechanic's Toolbox is in your Inventory.
Bring the Automobile Mechanic's Toolbox to Goofy.
Mount Maximus and head to Cruella's Car in the Quarry to pick up the Upholstery Fabric scent trail.

The trail begins in the Quarry!
  ‧ Track the scent trail from Cruella's Car to the Upholstery Fabric.
Harvest the Upholstery Fabric.
Make sure the Upholstery Fabric is in your Inventory.
Bring the Upholstery Fabric to Goofy.
Follow Goofy to the Quarry.
Talk to Goofy.

Make a fancy display around Cruella's Car.
  ‧ Purple Furniture.
  ‧ Modern Furniture.
  ‧ Traditional Furniture.
Take a picture of Cruella's Car.
Talk to Cruella.

quests.name: You're Really Wearing THAT?
objectives: Read the recipe for Jellied Salad by activating it from within your Inventory.

gather the Ingredients needed for a pair of Jellied Salads.
  ‧ 2 Scarlet Kale
  ‧ 2 Jellied Fish. (They lurk in yellow ripples...)
Cook 2 Jellied Salads.
Ursula and Cruella are waiting for their snack!
Bring the Jellied Salad to Ursula.
Make sure the Jellied Salad is in your Inventory.

Take a picture of some of the Villagers.
  ‧ ...Snow White.
  ‧ Alice.
  ‧ ...Daisy.

Ursula and Cruella are waiting to hear about the fashion crimes you witnessed.
  ‧ Talk to Ursula.

Dress up fashionably with a:
  ‧ Modern or Professional Top.
  ‧ A pair of Modern or Professional Paints.
Go inside Cruella's House to show her your new outfit.
Talk to Cruella.
Search Cruella's House for a clue about who committed the fashion crimes.
Show the Fishing Lure to Cruella.

Talk to the potential fashion criminals:
  ‧ Moana.
  ‧ Donald Duck.
  ‧ Kristoff.
Talk to Cruella.
Talk to Daisy.

Gather the resources needed to craft a Photo Backdrop.
  ‧ 10 Beady Soil
  ‧ 5 Antique Clothes Iron
  ‧ 5 Reclaimed Barn Wood
Craft a Photo Backdrop.
Make sure the Photo Backdrop is in your Inventory.
Bring the Photo Backdrop to Cruella.
Go the the Heart for the photo shoot.
Find Daisy and Cruella in the Wishblossom Heart and take pictures of them against the Photo Backdrop.
Talk to Daisy.
Talk to Cruella.

quests.name: Stripes Are In This Season
objectives:
Wear the colors Cruella suggested.
  ‧ Something pink.
  ‧ Something orange.
Talk to Cruella.

Cruella claims that Ursula stole her fashion sense!
  ‧ Talk to Ursula to get her side of the story.
Talk to Tigger.

Dress up Tigger-style:
  ‧ Something orange.
  ‧ Something black.
  ‧ Something quirky.
Or... Ignore Tigger's instructions and figure out where Tigger hid Cruella's Fashion Sense.

Show Tigger's style to other Villagers.
  ‧ Donald Duck.
  ‧ Snow White.
  ‧ Goofy.
Find Cruella's Fashion Sense buried near a "sweet" "water feature" in "Hunny Falls".
Show Cruella's Fashion Sense to Tigger.
Talk to Cruella.

Gather the resources to craft an Antique British Lamppost.
  ‧ 10 Pixie Dust.
  ‧ 10 Pyrite.
  ‧ 5 Jasper.
  ‧ 5 Fairy Sprinkles.
Craft an Antique British Lamppost.
Decorate in Wishblossom Ranch with the Antique British Lamppost.
Talk to Cruella.

quests.name: Headdress to Impress
objectives:
Will Daisy and Sally take part in the fashion show?
  ‧ Talk to Daisy to find out.

Gather the following materials for Sally and Daisy to make their hat:
  ‧ 5 Antique Clothes Iron.
  ‧ 5 White Crocus Flowers.
  ‧ 5 Red Silk Flowers.
Go to Snow White's House.
Listen to Cruella and Daisy.

Make sure the following materials for Sally and Daisy Duck's hat are in your Inventory:
  ‧ 5 Antique Clothes Iron.
  ‧ 5 White Crocus Flowers.
  ‧ 5 Red Silk Flowers.
Give the hat-making materials to Daisy.
Talk to Cruella.

Gather the materials needed to craft a Fashion Show Runway.
  ‧ 5 Grassy Ore.
  ‧ 5 Old Braided Rope.
  ‧ 5 Wire Coat Hanger.
  ‧ 5 Rusty Hinge.
Craft a Fashion Show Runway.
Make sure the Fashion Show Runway is in your Inventory.
Bring the Fashion Show Runway to Cruella.

Cruella seemed shifty - better check up on Sally and Daisy.
  ‧ Go into Snow White's House.
  ‧ Talk to Sally.
Fish Daisy and Sally's Damaged Hat out of a body of water in the Fortress.
Make sure that the Damaged Hat is in your Inventory.
Bring the Damaged Hat to Mirabel.

Cruella won't be happy to hear that Sally and Daisy got their hat repaired.
  ‧ Talk to Cruella to tell her that the contest is still on.

Put together a top-tier outfit using whichever hat you like the most.
  ‧ Either Cruella's Ornate Derby Hat or Sally's Nightmarish Witch Hat.
  ‧ Whatever else you think matches.
Place the Fashion Show Runway in the Wishblossom Ranch.
Walk the catwalk with your chosen outfit.
Talk to Cruella.
rewards: Black, White, and Chic All Over Hat
Black, White, and Chic All Over Jacket
